library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)

### Read in CSV

```{r}
df1 <- read_csv(here::here("sensitivity_analysis", "climate_rate", "med_mean_shock_013.csv"))

df2 <- read_csv(here::here("sensitivity_analysis", "climate_rate", "mean_shock_med_sum_geno.csv")) 
```

### Manipulate data

##### 1

```{r}
# Summarize pop size and frequency by genotype
geno_sum1 <- df1 %>%
  filter(age == "adult") %>% 
  group_by(lat, lon, generation, rep, genotype) %>%
  summarise(geno_pop_sum = sum(pop, na.rm = TRUE))

geno_mean1 <- geno_sum1 %>% 
  group_by(lat, lon, generation, genotype) %>% 
  summarise(geno_pop_mean = mean(geno_pop_sum, na.rm=TRUE))

pop_sum1 <- df1 %>%
  filter(age == "adult") %>% 
  group_by(lat, lon, generation, rep) %>%
  summarise(pop_sum = sum(pop, na.rm = TRUE), max_temp = max_temp, min_temp = min_temp)

pop_mean1 <- pop_sum1 %>%
  group_by(lat, lon, generation) %>%
  summarise(pop_mean = mean(pop_sum, rm.na = TRUE), max_temp = max_temp, min_temp = min_temp)

output_sum1 <- full_join(geno_mean1, pop_mean1) %>%
  mutate(freq = geno_pop_mean / pop_mean)
```

```{r}
#lon %in% c(9, 10, 11)
#lat %in% c(49, 50, 51)

#lon %in% c(9:14)
#lat %in% c(47:52)

#lon %in% c(5:14)
#lat %in% c(46:55)

## SELECT ADULTS ONLY <-edit to change
mpa_df1 <- output_sum1 %>%
  filter(lon %in% c(9:14)) %>%
  filter(lat %in% c(47:52)) %>%
  group_by(generation, genotype) %>%
  summarise(
    location_sum = sum(geno_pop_mean, na.rm = TRUE),
    max_temp = max(max_temp),
    min_temp = min(min_temp),
    freq_avg = mean(freq, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  mutate(generation = as.numeric(generation)) %>%
  mutate(min_m = 1 - (1 - exp((-(max_temp - 25)^2) / (4^2)))) %>%
  mutate(min_survival = ifelse(min_m > 0.59, 0.59, min_m)) %>%
  mutate(max_m = 1 - (1 - exp((-(min_temp - 25)^2) / (4^2)))) %>%
  mutate(max_survival = ifelse(max_m > 0.59, 0.59, max_m)) %>%
  select(-max_m, -min_m) %>% 
  mutate(dd = 0.013)

```


```{r}
data = full_join(mpa_df1, df2) %>% 
  mutate(dd = as.factor(dd))

write_csv(data, here::here("sensitivity_analysis", "climate_rate", "mean_shock_med_sum_geno.csv"))
```
